Rowdy Wolf:





Rowdy Wolf jerked up. Strangers meant invaders to him. Beast or bot. He 
stood up, the heavy furs on his body flowing at his movements.

"It is my right to look after this," he said after Zyber. He ran after her, 
and transformed to his beast mode. He had to push himself with his heavy 
body and short legs that his dire wolf beast mode had. He wasn't much on 
speed when it came to hunting, he relied on ambush and stealth.

He sniffed the air as he ran, taking in the scents of the bots. The one a 
wolf--that wasn't good to him. Male as well. His jaws ached to bite into 
that one. The other was some sort of bird. He growled as he went on. As far 
as he was concered, there were trespassing on his territor and will be 
killed.

His nose zoned into their position. He hung a right, plowing up a hill. He 
couldn't hit them head-on. That would be stupid. He had to study their 
position then take them out from there.
